short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to test your checkout. Autofill or copy any Stripe test card with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of entering 4242 4242 4242 4242 over and over again? Having to Google for Stripe test cards every time you want to test a specific scenario?

Stripe Buddy makes that a thing of the past. Bring all of Stripe's test cards in reach of a single-click.

Autofill or copy any test card so that you can breeze through your checkout testing without ever having to remember card names or keep entering them over and over again.

disclaimer: this extension is not in any way affiliated with Stripe and test cards are not the be used for other purposes then testing your own checkout.
